betterquesting:10.desc:8:
While the civilization, and the abitable land, of Lyndenwyrm are gone, traces of what once was still remain, and act as guides on how this powerful civilization may have worked.
Stormlight magic played a pivotal role in how life was carried, likely in a similar way to how cars are a common part of life to humanity. A tool that is widely available and convenient.
This is because, well, the entirety of Lyndenwyrm is a massive crystal planet, one that, through its structure, acts as a near-infinite source of this magical resource.
